entry.title: Java
entry.content:
Java common operations

List

List Reverse

List contains

List Shallow clone

For the reference data type, the copy is its reference, and a new object is not created, that is, no new memory space is allocated. Such a copy is called a shallow copy.

Shallow copy of list A to list B is to directly copy the content of A to B,so A and B point to the same address. The consequence is that changing B will also change A, because changing B is changing the content of the address pointed to by B.

List deep clone

Deep copy is to copy A to B at the same time, create a new address for B, and then transfer the content of address A to address B. The contents of ListA and ListB are the same, but because they point to different addresses, the changes will not affect each other.

entry.title: FIT5042 JSF
entry.content:
Lecturer 溫꿨鸚ゅ객弱т驪轝▽륵弱띄tutorial竊溫10誤餓阿뜹弱김ゅ런凉冶㎫壅孃鸚礖恙듕亦↑뀐瓦②양弱썰겻밭밧╉

JSF

JSF(JavaServer Faces)뷰←ク瀯餓띄ⓩ루€뜰JSF 鴉요訝訝餓Java Webⓩ루€瓦드쑵MVC溫얕→Æ凉旅뜰歷곁WEB佯①佯烏訝뷴겻당獵삠 ⓩ루㏘빰(V), 佯①佯경삭(M). 訝뷰꿩℡백〉€ゆ訝閭ｅ溫욥竊訝佯①佯ⓩ룝벡雅긴訝ゅ塋Faces servlet (C) ε V>鰲 M>與▼ C> ㎩뜹ⓦ

Servlet

Servlet餓阿

Java Servlet 鵝訝Http 若€루ク瑥룡경佯阿당訝닷

Java Bean

Java Bean 弱길訝訝java 映삼躍며ⓩε겻雅驪渦躍며①嶸쏙亮뜹餓ε若방熬ラ鸚鵝욜ⓩε뜸佯ⓧ릎삠Java Bean 訝燁瀯餓뜻竊弱긷雅訝訝ゆ녔竊瓦訝ゆ녔餓εⓨ鸚경밥슴⑨阿餓ζ堊孃鸚(놂ㅿ)竊 瓦訝ゆ녔弱길訝訝ょ餓.

Beanヤ鸚鵝욜①Java瀯餓뜰瘟瀯餓뜹갚訝訝ょ긷餓θよ瓦烏①←訝訝ゆ訝ょ굳瀯. 亮뜸鸚訝雅鰲ｅ뜹ⓧ에瓦烏밧獰ㅴ. 鵝욜ⓨ野배괌よ썽瓦εｆζ鵝.

鵝Java Bean窯鸚誤黎竊

  1. 瓦訝ょ굳public. 亮뜸訝訝default constructor.

  2. 瓦訝ょ굳掠㎩窈삥private,瓦public 映삣setXxx() getXxx() 溫욥.

  3. 餓ζbean뜻岳耶①＼訝竊餓δ씩ε餓ζ℡

  4. 瓦訝ょ굳誤썸雅餓뜯,驪倻addXxxListener(XxxEvent e),雅餓뜹餓ζclick雅餓,keyboard雅餓띰ゅ阿雅餓띄

  5. JavaBean恙窈삥얍ⓧ訝ゅ竊package竊訝

    Java Bean

Java Bean vs POJO vs VO

entry.title: Leetcode Array 3
entry.content:
Remove Element

Question * Easy *

Given an array nums and a value val, remove all instances of that value in-place and return the new length. Do not allocate extra space for another array, you must do this by modifying the input array in-place with O(1) extra memory. The order of elements can be changed. It doesnt matter what you leave beyond the new length.

Example 1

Example 2

My solution

Solution 1

瓦訝ゆ방驪渦寧ⓥ 腰溫←곁nums㏘嶺雅val訝ゆ X 弱길⑴ⓨ쑵竊곁®雅valitem熬ョ┿瓦訝item瓦訝嶺雅val겼겼요빰 阿餓θ답餓ф雅ㅶ㏘營瓦瓦訝ゆ방瓮

Solution 2

瓦訝ゆ방瑥닷瑥孃藥㏆Leetcode solution訝訝訝ゆ瓮孃 鸚㎬닸瓮弱길孃ょ瓦訝ゆ곁訝嶺雅val item訝ょ㎉경곁㏂瓦index阿弱길곁訝訝嶺雅val訝ゆ겹

Leetcode Solution

When we encounter nums[i]=val, we can swap the current element out with the last element and dispose the last one. This essentially reduces the arrays size by 1.

Note that the last element that was swapped in could be the value you want to remove itself. But dont worry, in the next iteration we will still check this element.

Leetcode Clarification

Confused why the returned value is an integer but your answer is an array?

Note that the input array is passed in by reference, which means modification to the input array will be known to the caller as well.

Internally you can think of this:

entry.title: Leetcode Array 2
entry.content:
Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array

Question * Easy *

Given a sorted array nums, remove the duplicates in-place such that each element appear only once and return the new length.

Do not allocate extra space for another array, you must do this by modifying the input array in-place with O(1) extra memory.

Hints:

Example 1

Example 2

My solution

썸餓鸚⒳雅訝鸚⑴瑥억凉鸚닸瑥삯亦↑삡瀯竊若녕瓦窯鰲ｄ鸚⑼뜹阿弱긷럴瀯뷸δ竊녑役瑥訝testcase竊瀯겼럴瀯뷸η방亦▼野뱄뜹겼竊瀯擁擁鸚餓θ餓뜸瑥닸雅餓瀯誤 곁弱길> 窯訝瑥당 a sorted array nums. 弱길瓦訝ゆ곁®榮藥꿰也썽『佯 役瑥若瓦訝ㅴ릉example餓ε경깹窯役瑥[0,1,2,2,4,3,4] 嶺嶺testcase竊瀯경방孃訝경ｈ㎗ 뜹testcase雅

腰방瀯닷븀양鰲ｇin-place 竊鰲ｅ갚곁力弱길ゅ①경곁€鵝竊訝窯鸚凉ζ곁곁凉渦곁令븅담 餓餓堊渦뷸θ渦η訝燁嶸力

鰲ｄin-place algorithm餓ε竊 弱김瘟瓮

㏝『佯곁®訝ㅴ릉瓦겼訝ㅴ륵驪渦竊倻訝訝룟갚ⓨ®겼욘℡®겼閭ㅸ弱길for孃ょ뜹if▽뻑ㅶ 鵝訝訝ら窯竊썸瓦瀯2訝や빳訝겼썸訝루驪倻example 2 訝訝1瓦瀯 ｄ嶺旅양띄К訝訝2誤욘®К雅訝1 긴寧т訝1욘㏘寧т訝0竊寧т訝1index1 餓ηК訝訝2index2. 餓ι誤溫←訝겼욘℡®瓦瀯멨겼餓εindex 弱길녑겻溫←瓦瀯멨겼ㅶ轝→ x. 뜹ⓧ겼хindexx孃겻겼욘瓦瀯멨겼餓εindex瓦룝訝訝や겼욘℡瓦瀯멨겼竊弱긷餓ε경곁nums곁瓦integer곁nums곁℡㏘겼訝ゆ겹

entry.title: Leetcode Array 1
entry.content:
Two Sum

Question * Easy *

Given an array of integers, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to a specific target. (You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice.)

Hints竊

My Solution

녔 瓦堊곁竊倻餓ζ얍겻륵곁멨嶺雅겹瓦룟갚餓θ瓦訝ㅴ릉겼Index뜹瓦訝ㅴ릉곁Index 壤€訝訝ゆ곁곁鵝訝return

鵝①solution뜹竊경鰲ｉ瓮熬ュ映삡맏 Brute Force. solution瓦뜸방 Two- pass Hash Table, One-Pass Hash Table. 鰲ｉ방熬ュ映삡맏Brute Force訝 time complexity == O($n^2$) . 瓦燁방野밥驪訝訝ゅ榮竊驪訝轝loop곁⒳榮ζ얍烏ζ곈誤긺띌닸O(n)竊餓δ륵掠for孃ょ訝 time complexity == O($n^2$). 鰲訝억방訝鴉鰲ｏ띌닷佯백

TIME COMPLEXITY

瑥ζ㎬轝→곁㎞訝븃ι佯띌닻佯,溫겻맏T(n) 雅뷸ф鵝㎬轝→곁썸T(n)阿力簾驪渦餓ｇ瓦烏띌담 驪倻嶸力A T(n) = 100n, 嶸力B T(n) = 5$n^2$,嶸力A嶸力B瘟瓦烏띌닻욕갚n쇗념閭ㅶ雅歷瓦띌닷佯 (Asymptotic Time Complexity)礖恙.

ζ訝渦⒴썸f(n),鵝욕壤n擁瓦雅令룟ㄷ띰T(n) / f(n) 쇌맏訝嶺雅띄躍멩곤燁f(n)T(n)곈瀛㎩썸겹溫겻竊T(n) = O(f(n))竊 燁 O(f(n)) 訝븀力歷瓦띌닷佯竊嶸燁띌닷佯竊阿燁겼ㄷO烏①ㅊ力 띌닷佯녑雅葉佯瓦烏竊閭ㅷ밧ラ誤

띌닷佯竊

  1. 倻瓦烏띌 T(n)躍멩곈瀛㏆ O(1) 烏①ㅊ
  2. T(n) や띌닷썸겻릎遙띌」
  3. T(n) 餓η삥鸚띌」®楹삥겹

瓦影嶸阿塋孃也쏙https://www.jianshu.com/p/f4cca5ce055a

瓦影轢ョ삭㎗띌닷佯띌誤㏛孃孃也쏙https://www.cxyxiaowu.com/5323.html

Two-pass Hash Table

⑴hash table竊弱令븅닸㏘맏佯╊ζ얏띌닻鵝⑴hash table阿餓ε엮ζ얇阿訝뷴꿰竊ζ얏띌닺鴉삠 Two-pass Hash Table㏘ⓨ겻륵轝iterations.寧т轝→驪訝訝ゅ榮valueindex曆삣瓦table寧т轝→ζ얍榮烏ζ겹

瓦루瑥竊띌닷佯弱길O(n)竊양뜻깹葯也for孃ょ 驪訝轝→θ€띌닸O(1).

One-pass Hash Table

two-pass hash table 訝弱길竊 one-pass hash table餓 insert element into table 뜹 check 壤 榮烏ζ경藥꿰耶②〃쇤雅倻耶 瓦solution

띌닷佯╊양뜻O(n). 令븅닷佯╊O(n)竊窯鸚令븅닷념鸚弱items誤耶瓦hash table.

HashMap

兩뷴배괌> HashMap<String,Integer> hashMap = new HashMap<>();

耶ⓩ경 瓦put 竊key,value)> hashMap.put("aa",1);

put방鴉誤value╊燁방putIfAbsent(key,value) 訝鴉誤

hashMap.putIfAbsent("aa",4);

ㅵ榮

remove(key):ㅶ(耶key)竊瓦熬ュㅷkey野밧value竊瓦null

remove(key,value):ㅶ竊耶entry竊竊瓦true竊瓦false

hashMap.remove("aa",5);

룟榮

hashMap.get("aa");

getOrDefaultkey訝耶ⓩ,瓦訝訝defaultValue

getOrDefault("aa",-1);

榮

ㅶKeyvalue耶

욘℡榮

hashMap.replace("ff",5);
